last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a side story taking place back in school, Xiaoxi fails to impress the judges at a singing competition, and Jiang Chen turns up to comfort her.

name: A Love So Beautiful
overview: The ups and downs of school, family and growing up test the affection between a budding artist and her handsome but indifferent classmate and neighbor.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Chen Xiaoxi’s neighbor and classmate keeps rejecting her advances, she asks a friend to help her draft a love letter, but her antics backfire.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi consoles Jiang Chen when his mom cancels her visit, leaving him to mourn alone on his father's memorial day.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi runs for class leader, but Jiang Chen's vote and a crisis of missing fees shakes her confidence in her own leadership skills.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ahead of Jiang Chen's birthday, Xiaoxi signs up for a hurdle race to win a watch for his gift, but Lin Jingxiao also wants the same thing for her dad.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jiang Chen refuses to join Xiaoxi's production of "My Fair Princess" for the school competition. Wu Bosong bonds with Xiaoxi while rehearsing lines.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Devastated by the embarrassing mix-up in the play, Xiaoxi struggles at school as final exams loom. Meanwhile, her parents consider transferring her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Lu Yang falls for a scam trivia contest. Xiaoxi tells Jiang Chen about her parents constantly quarreling over their plans for a mom and pop store.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi can't afford to buy tickets to the Manchester United friendly match so she buys Jiang Chen a Rooney shirt instead, but he turns it down.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi keeps avoiding Wu Bosong after finding out he likes her. Xiaoxi takes part in the debate tournament, replacing a classmate who’s fallen ill.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Wu Bosong finds a way to keep Xiaoxi company when she's quarantined for avian flu, pitting himself against Jiang Chen.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi takes up knitting as Christmas approaches. Lin Jingxiao goes to Mr. Li's office to give him a scarf -- but sees another gift box on his desk.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Wu Bosong meets the national team coach. Xiaoxi hopes for a romantic evening with Jiang Chen under the fireworks -- but sees him embracing Li Wei.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A heartbroken Xiaoxi gives Jiang Chen the silent treatment, despite his attempts to make it up to her. Li Wei gets caught cheating on an exam.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Lu Yang helps Jiang Chen and Xiaoxi reconcile. Jingxiao is furious when Mr. Li takes the blame for the missing diazepam in order to protect Li Wei.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Injured, Wu Bosong has to pull out of the swimming competition. Xiaoxi is determined to study hard so that she can follow Jiang Chen to Beijing.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Jingxiao visits Lu Yang at the hospital to help him with school work. Jiang Chen's mom disapproves of his decision to give up on Tsinghua University.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Jingxiao and Lu Yang become an item. Rejected from the school in Hangzhou, Xiaoxi decides to prepare for the arts exam.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: At university, Xiaoxi and Jiang Chen are entered into a "best couple" contest. Jiang Chen asks his mentor to help with Lu Yang's surgery.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Jiang Chen considers an offer to receive training at a Beijing hospital, putting his relationship with Xiaoxi at a crossroads.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: After bumping into Xiaoxi again three years later, Jiang Chen helps arrange for her dad's surgery and prepares to win her back.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Jiang Chen and Xiaoxi clear up misunderstandings about their past breakup, and Xiaoxi is torn when Jiang Chen asks for a chance to get back together.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Jiang Chen goes out on a limb to help Xiaoxi self-publish her comic book. Wu Bosong rushes to propose to Xiaoxi, but he already knows her answer.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Xiaoxi’s parents show up unannounced while Jiang Chen is staying over. Xiaoxi's friends make a surprise showing during her book signing.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: In a side story taking place back in school, Xiaoxi fails to impress the judges at a singing competition, and Jiang Chen turns up to comfort her.
